item.title: ~~ I am in search of help with compile errors. ~~
item.dc:creator: @i_puzzle_i i_puzzle_i
item.description:
@i_puzzle_i wrote:

I keep getting this…

—/

client.java:39: client is not abstract and does not override abstract method sendpm(long,int,byte[],int) in Player public class client extends Player implements Runnable { ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error

And this is where I think the error resides…

—/

[code]import java.text.*;

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {
public void writePlayers() {
int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount();
sendFrame126("@whi@<<,~ @gre@P@bla@u@red@z@yel@z@cya@l@blu@e@red@S@whi@c@red@a@blu@p@gre@e @whi@~,>>", 6570);
sendFrame126("@gre@Players @red@Online " + players, 6572);
SimpleDateFormat sdf = new SimpleDateFormat(“MMMMMMMMMMMMMM dd hh:mm”);
String date = sdf.format(new Date());
sendFrame126("@cya@" + date, 6664);
setInterfaceWalkable(6673);
}

public void println_debug(String str) {
	//System.out.println("[client-"+playerId+"-"+playerName+"]: "+str);
}[/code]

Help me with my error pl0x?
